title: DP_AINFO (Struct)
text:
TYPE DP_AINFO : STRUCT
Alarm information of a profibus device (see:
RALARM
).
(see IEC 61158-6)

rows.Name: D_LEN
rows.Comment: Length of the alarm information: 4 .. 63 bytes

rows.Name: ASPEC
rows.Comment: Alarm SpecifierBit 0 to 1:0: no further differentiation1: Alarm appears and the related module is disturbed2: Alarm disappears and the related module has no further errors3: Alarm disappears and the related module is still disturbedBit 2: Additional acknowledgeBit 3 to 7: Sequence number of alarm
